page.title: 20World Charities, Pitreavie
page.content: The world has been trying to help the famine in Ehtiopia. Oxfam, Christian Aid and other charities have worked nonstop, trying to relieve the famine. It was caused by a mixture of civil war and drought. The soldiers fighting intercept the food lorries because they to need the food. This makes the situation worse.Room 14 in our school were doing a project on newspapers. This was the main article in the news and their efforts triggered a school wide campaign. Every Monday, members of Room 14 have a collection, going round all the classes. Four primary 7 girls organised and held a jumble sale which raised 154.06 pounds. The total amount raised by the school is 825.01 pounds so far. The school also knits jumpers for the babies and squares for blankets. Gwen Milligan.
